meanings.definition: A layer of decoration applied on top of a fired ceramic glaze.
meanings.sent1: The artist carefully added an overglaze of gold paint to the ceramic vase.
meanings.sent2: The overglaze on the plate made it look shiny and colorful.
meanings.sent3: The overglaze on the bowl seemed to dance in the sunlight, creating a magical effect.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an overglaze, adding brightness and beauty to the room.
meanings.sent5: The overglaze of happiness in her eyes was contagious, spreading joy to everyone around.

meanings.definition: To apply a layer of decoration on top of a fired ceramic glaze.
meanings.sent1: She decided to overglaze the pottery with intricate patterns for a unique look.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully overglazed the ceramic tiles to enhance their appearance.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally overglazed the teapot, turning it into a colorful masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The chef's creativity overglazed the dessert, making it a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The decorator overglazed the mirror, transforming it into a stunning focal point.
